“With your surpassing beauty

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ca te sabbadisā pabhāsati iti

“I gave a white lotus with green leaves,
born in the water of a lotus pond,
to a monk who was walking for alms,🔽in the village of Esi,
in the beautiful, well-laid-out city.
Because of that my complexion is like this.
